name: 2048 Fun Cards
description:
Combining a classic 2048 game with an original card twist, designed for the people who want to reduce pressure and train brain!

How to play:
-Drag the top card up to play on any column or card.
-Score as many points as you can before time runs out!
-Create waterfalls by stacking cards in a descending order.
-You can also TAP directly on any column to play your card.
-Draw the card to any one of the queues above, the connected cards will be eliminated if they match!
-The universal card can be combined with any other card, but the score will be halved.
-When using CUT, you can select any card to eliminate, and the eliminated card will not score.
-You can drag the unwanted card into the can to destroy it.

Features:
-2048 & card elements
-No time limit
-Smooth animation
-Casual puzzle game
-Colorful graphics
